key.name: override-results-order
key.summary: Boolean, whether to override the default search results order to prioritize VS Code workspaces. Requires disabling and re-enabling the extension to take effect.

key.name: suffix
key.summary: Boolean, whether to show a suffix next to the workspace name. (Remote, Codespaces...)

key.name: include-dev-containers
key.summary: Boolean, whether to include dev containers in the workspace list.

key.name: include-code-spaces
key.summary: Boolean, whether to include code spaces in the workspace list.

key.name: include-github
key.summary: Boolean, whether to include GitHub Virtual Files Systems in the workspace list.

key.name: enable-vscode
key.summary: Boolean, whether to include VS Code workspaces in the search results.

key.name: enable-vscodium
key.summary: Boolean, whether to include VSCodium workspaces in the search results.

key.name: enable-antigravity
key.summary: Boolean, whether to include Antigravity workspaces in the search results.
